item.title: Alachua school board punished for silencing critic in Hulk Hogan clash
item.description: What started as a jab at the late pro wrestler Hulk Hogan turned into a legal pile-driver for one Florida school board, which now faces mandatory free speech training – and possible pay cuts – after state officials said it muzzled a critic.

item.title: FPL's settlement proposal substantially lowers initial rate request
item.description: After reaching an agreement with 10 key stakeholders,Florida Power & Light filed on Wednesdaya comprehensive four-year settlement agreement with state regulators.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…
Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: 'Secret plea deal' by prosecutors is a betrayal to…
item.description: As a lawyer who has represented many of Jeffrey Epstein’s and Ghislaine Maxwell’s victims dating back to 2008, I cannot stay silent while politicians and government officials continue to hide the truth.
